name: Lockstep (Racer)
description:
Short Description:

Lockstep is a playable android game where you're presented with a combination lock to unlock. More details are available inside the game's Info menu. 

Team:

Me /Chukwuma = Native Lions 

References:

Lockstep game was Inspired by this video: How to open a combination master lock and also IGDA Foundation for the Wonderful theme they provided.
